resources.string:
Develop AI tools for health care products in digital pathology for the processing and analysis of cytology imaging data. 

1. Cooperate with laboratory physicians to develop software for automatic feature quantification from cytological images 
2. Analyze 3000+ images and build diagnostic prediction models for different stains including conventional Romanowsky, Papanicolaou and LBC. 
3. Tailor the software for clients and fixed bugs for released versions 
4. Optimize image processing algorithm from 1 image/min to 20 images/min 
5. Provide product knowledge training for local and international clients 
6. Mentor summer interns in software development and design
